attributes.action: DO NOT CLOSE KEIGHLEY POLICE STATION
attributes.additional_details: It is under review to close Keighley Police Station due to funding cuts within the Police Force by the Government.  Never before has a Police Force been needed as much as now.  There is increase in crime.  We pay our Council Tax for this service so we should surely have a say.  KEIGHLEY NEEDS AN ACTIVE POLICE FORCE AND A POLICE STATION

rejection.details: This is a police force decision
